ygData.subject: RE: Temple of Solusek Ro
ygData.msgSnippet: Regardless, this is on the test server.  We couldn t very well complain that there are no bard quests (if there aren t, I haven t tried and really don t know),
ygData.messageBody:
Regardless, this is on the test server. We couldn't very well complain that
there are no bard quests (if there aren't, I haven't tried and really don't
know), since the zone isn't even finalized yet.


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Friday, October 01, 1999 1:12 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Temple of Solusek Ro


From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>

On EQLizer is a brief report on the new zone Temple of Solusek Ro. The guy
who wrote the report went there on the test server. Apparently this zone is
not intended to be a standard adventuring zone but a quest-oriented zone.
Supposedly, no matter what your race or class, all the NPCs in there /con
indifferent to you. The quests are supposed to be class specific and each
NPC is supposed to give multiple quests. Its possible that the quests are
all connected and that when you finish the final quest, you get a nice item
usuable by your class only.

Has anyone been on the test server since the zone was added to confirm if
bard only quests were implemented? If there were, the letter we are sending
to GZ may need to get revised to remove that concern. If there isn't a bard
NPC in Solusek Ro, then perhaps it should be revised to also voice a concern
about the lack of a bard quest in Solusek Ro.

EQLizer URL: http://www.gameznet.com/eq/

Galtin of E'ci
